name: Little Big Square
description:
Little Big Square is a 2D puzzle game where you can resize the world.

Controls
  • UP/LEFT/DOWN/RIGHT to move.
  • Hold SHIFT to slow down (this is useful for precise movements!)
  • R to reset level.
  • M to mute music.
  • - and + to adjust volume.
  • Other controls will be explained in-game.
Credits

Made with HaxeFlixel.

Programming/Design

Colin Lu, Jon Schneider, Anderson Wang

Music

Anderson Wang

Cake Sprite

Colin Lu

Source

https://github.com/andersonw/ld38-haxe

Note: We edited the game after the deadline to make a very small quality-of-life change we forgot to put in originally (holding down SHIFT to move slower).
